lead_paragraph: Peter Moores was fired as coach of the England team by the England and Wales Cricket Board, and the former captain Andrew Strauss was given the new role of director of cricket.

headline.main: England’s Coach Fired for a Second Time
headline.print_headline: England’s Coach Fired for a Second Time

snippet: Peter Moores was fired as coach of the England team by the England and Wales Cricket Board, and the former captain Andrew Strauss was given the new role of director of cricket.
